name: Artik
description: Artik is a Community Driven Investment Protocol where investors can suggest, discover and vote for hand picked high potential projects. Artik is built around a weekly voting competition, holders can vote for the project that they prefer and we airdrop them with the token that wins. It allows not only to discover tokens as an investor but also to provide visibility to deserving projects. Every $ARTKâ€™s transaction is taxed 10% and divided as follow: - 6% used to buy the tokens with most votes and airdrop it to holders - 2% buy back and burn - 2% in Marketing Benefits of holding $ARTK: - Get weekly airdrops of high potential projects - Diversify effortlessly your portfolio with handpicked projects - Be part of an active community that collaboratively reviews opportunities
